content.question: Which of the following best explains why the science of eugenics and genetic engineering caused significant debates in Europe in the latter half of the twentieth century?

choices.label: The baby boom after the Second World War raised concerns about overpopulation.
The possibility of selecting desired characteristics was similar to Nazi racial goals.
The Cold War led to concerns about the military uses of eugenics.
The feminist movement opposed developments that might restrict the freedom of women to make their own reproductive choices.

content.answer: The possibility of selecting desired characteristics was similar to Nazi racial goals.

skill.text: Skill 5.B: Explain how a historical development or process relates to another historical development or process.
